concise_definition: n. 野猫, 野生猫科动物; (非正式) 未经批准的罢工, 非法开采; (体育) 野猫队（球队名)

definitions.explanation_en: A wild or untamed member of the cat family, especially species such as the European wildcat or the African wildcat, living in natural habitats without domestication.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指猫科动物中未被驯化的野生种类，如欧洲野猫或非洲野猫，生活在自然环境中，未被人类驯养。
definitions.example_en: Conservationists are working to protect the habitat of the Scottish wildcat, one of the rarest mammals in Europe.
definitions.example_cn: 保护主义者正在努力保护苏格兰野猫的栖息地，这是欧洲最稀有的哺乳动物之一。

definitions.explanation_en: An unauthorized or unofficial strike by workers, not sanctioned by a labor union, often spontaneous and illegal under labor agreements.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指工人未经工会批准而自发进行的罢工，通常违反劳动合同，属于非法行为。
definitions.example_en: The factory shut down after a wildcat strike by assembly-line workers over unsafe conditions.
definitions.example_cn: 由于装配线工人因工作条件不安全而发起非法罢工，工厂被迫停工。

definitions.explanation_en: An unlicensed or illegal oil well drilled in search of petroleum, especially in areas not officially zoned for drilling.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指在未经许可的区域非法钻探以寻找石油的油井，通常违反土地使用法规。
definitions.example_en: In the early 20th century, wildcats rushed to Texas hoping to strike oil and become rich overnight.
definitions.example_cn: 20世纪初，许多投机者涌向德克萨斯州，希望钻出石油一夜暴富。

definitions.explanation_en: A nickname for sports teams, especially in American college or professional sports, often chosen to symbolize ferocity, independence, or agility.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指体育队伍的绰号，尤其在美国大学或职业体育中，常用来象征凶猛、独立或敏捷的特质。
definitions.example_en: The Arizona Wildcats defeated their rivals in a thrilling overtime game last weekend.
definitions.example_cn: 上周六，亚利桑那野猫队在一场激动人心的加时赛中击败了对手。

comparison.analysis: “Cat”（猫）泛指所有猫科动物，包括家猫和野生种类，是一个通用词。而 “wildcat” 特指未被驯化的野生猫科动物，强调其野性、自然状态和非家养属性，语义更具体、更具生态指向性。
“Strike”（罢工）是中性术语，泛指任何形式的集体停工行为，无论是否合法或有组织。而 “wildcat strike” 是其子类，特指未经工会授权、自发且通常违法的罢工，带有强烈的非正式性和对抗性含义。
“Prospect”（勘探者/前景）指寻找资源（如石油）的人或可能性，是一个抽象或职业性名词。而 “wildcat” 在石油语境中特指非法钻探行为本身或钻探者，带有冒险、非法和投机的色彩，语义更具体且具贬义或俚语色彩。
